Experience

Shell Exploration and Production Company

Staff Wells Engineer, Global Unconventionals Theme Office

Houston, TX
2018 - Current

Unconventionals Casing Design in Permian, Argentina, and Appalachia assets, generating savings between 15% - 35% of total casing cost per respective asset.

Led 12 focal points across six teams in generation of deterministic and probabilistic well cost estimates for $1 billion annual Wells spend as Operating Plan Coordinator.

Supported four teams across North and South America as Subject Matter Expert in Well Cost Engineering.

Conducted multivariate analysis and design in Permian risk based well design, trajectory impact, and Appalachia packer requirements and cement design, generating $300k per well savings (20% of well cost).

Supervised intern in development and implementation of improved Well trajectory design workflow.
